testcase.name: Register new user
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the url "https://www.automationexercise.com".............passed And user verify home page is visibly........................................passed Then user click 'Signup/Login' button.......................................passed And user verify 'New User Signup!' is visible...............................passed And user enter name and email as "<name>" , "<email>".......................passed Then user click Signup button...............................................passed And verify 'Enter Account Information' is visible...........................passed And enter Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of Birth as "<title>" , "<name>" , "<email>" , "<password>" , "<day>" , "<month>" , "<year>".passed And user selects first checkbox.............................................passed Then user selects second checkbox...........................................passed And user fill details firstname,lastname,company,address1,address2,country,state,city,zipcode,mobile number as "<firstname>", "<lastname>" , "<company>" , "<address1>" , "<address2>" , "Canada" , "ON" , "Ottawa" , "35689" , "123456789".passed Then user click create account button.......................................passed Then verify 'Account created!" is visible...................................passed And click continue button...................................................passed Then verify Logged in as username is visible................................passed When user click Delete Account button.......................................passed Then verify Account Deleted! is visible and click continue..................passed
